author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO JAMAICA BY  MIDDAY TODAY WITH LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE... ...EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
summary:
...BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO JAMAICA BY  MIDDAY TODAY WITH LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE... ...EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Wed Jul 3
 the center of Beryl was located near 16.9, -75.3
 with movement WNW at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 952 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
